main event: Approximately 12 objects appeared suddenly next to a star, increased in glow, and exhibited zigzag movements for about 3 minutes.
interesting points: The objects varied in brightness and course during the observation., A total of 14 objects were reported., The behavior of the objects resembled meteors., There is speculation that the sighting could be explained by nearby electric lights and weather balloons., The observer noted that several objects performed abrupt angular changes in direction.
witness description: Capt Armand Teellecodte, USAF, 623 AC&W Squadron Operations Officer, rated command pilot in reciprocating engine aircraft
